item.title: What leading a global architecture firm has taught me about AI’s power to transform business

item.title: New Nestlé CEO joined the company straight out college—like Mary Barra and Doug McMillon, he climbed all the way to the top at a single company
item.description: Philipp Navratil joins Fortune 500 leaders in proving that playing the long game up the same corporate ladder can pay off.

item.title: Trump-backed crypto firm American Bitcoin notches $5 billion valuation in Nasdaq debut
item.description: The company trades under the ticker ABTC.
